textBox.richText: Elie Khoury just joined the biometrics group at Idiap to work on the project LOBI. Welcome Elie ! Elie Khoury is currently a post-doctoral researcher at Idiap Research Institute at Martigny, Switzerland working with Dr. Sébastien Marcel.  Elie received his engineering Degree from the Lebanese University in 2005. He obtained his Master Degree in 2006 from the University of Toulouse III, France. In 2010, He received his Ph.D. in Computer Science from the University of Toulouse where he worked at IRIT laboratory. In 2010, he was a post doctoral researcher in the Computer Science Laboratory (LIUM) of the University of Maine. His research interests include speech and image processing, video indexing and audiovisual identification of persons.
